data.text: @mmaphum_1 @DestinyConnect 😅Understandably so...motherhood is a very demanding job!! Especially if you have a big family like mine.
@DestinyConnect @SibaMtongana Kids are so special. Even numbers(kids) has always been my dream.
@DestinyConnect @SibaMtongana The more the merrier go for it girl
@DestinyConnect @SpitchNzawumbi @SibaMtongana Wow God blessed u sisi with such lovely gifts n usemhle nangok loTixo singa menzel'into,  I'm happy 4u Siba

@DestinyConnect @SibaMtongana Congratulations Siba❤... 

More blessings to you and your family.
@1z1babes @DestinyConnect 🤗
@SibaMtongana @DestinyConnect Yea.. I’m not completely mentially ready but I’m up for it. Thanks.. all the best with this new blessing 💕💕
@1z1babes @DestinyConnect Also if it doesn’t work out the way it’s  planned - you must still be happy as we don’t have a final say in the say in the gender of the gift we are given...

@1z1babes @DestinyConnect I don’t overthink it. If I did then maybe it would end up not doing it...but I do make sure I’m ready for it especially financially and emotionally as it demands both intensively. ❤️ all the best.

@DestinyConnect @SibaMtongana My man wants to have 4 in the future... exactly 2 boys 2 girls! 
You make it look so simple 😍🙈🙉
@DestinyConnect @SpitchNzawumbi @SibaMtongana Congrats 🌹u strong ntombi
@Oliver_RSA @DestinyConnect Yessssss...I’m glad I’m part of that admiration then...you  get 7 seaters too...3 kids need a 7 seater too if you travel with a nanny. 😜😉
@mmaphum_1 @DestinyConnect 🤣🤣 why the expression?! It’s a blessing. ❤️🤗
@congiwe @Rau_K @DestinyConnect You’re welcome darling. Lovies to you. ❤️

@SibaMtongana @Rau_K @DestinyConnect I fully agree, it bolds down to affordability and       a support structure (hubby of off course). If you have them both, why not. Thanks Siba for staying humble and connecting to your followers. Stay blessed ❤️.

@congiwe @Rau_K @DestinyConnect Eish otherwise it becomes overwhelming to be the only actively responsible parent to all kids and the demands that come with it...the lovely thing nowadays is that some man are more open to being active fathers than passive ones. And that really helps and that’s what is needed!

@congiwe @Rau_K @DestinyConnect So if you are blessed in that area then that surely enable you to have more if you so desire...it’s not easy but it is doable. I’m busy but Inhave olaces structures in place to create a stable system...and it helps having a hubby who equally successful who is  very supportive⚖️

@congiwe @Rau_K @DestinyConnect Hahaha! I’m glad. Think about it though. I think the biggest factor in our time is affordability cause want to give our kids more opportunities than we had. Plus having support cause we nolonger stay so close with our parents/family where they can help out when needs be.

@SibaMtongana @Rau_K @DestinyConnect Woow! Jonga u have change my mindset. I always had this ideology that having more than 2 kids will certainly delay my progress in life, but you are proving us wrong. You are one of kind Siba❤️

@maka_kk @Rau_K @DestinyConnect Hahah!!! Well awukudanga kakhulu from inyani ... Kaloku sisebenza kangaka nje, asisebenzeli mahala. Kodwa ke this time, nguPrincess omthe futhu umama then wandithi ✨extra glow ❤️💃🏽🙌🏾😂
@maka_kk @Rau_K @DestinyConnect Kwaaaaa!!!! 🤣💃🏽 Tell the truth. You thought I eat all the good food I make alone and go niks mapha 🤣...just kidding!!! Thank you my darling.. ❤️

@congiwe @Rau_K @DestinyConnect That’s sweet thanks!!! I take it from my mom. She was a teacher had 6 kids of her own and then adopted 2!!! Yhooo with dad they raised 8 kids. Plus took care of some of their nieces and nephews and her mum in her later years!!! What a strong woman  🙌🏾❤️
@SibaMtongana @Rau_K @DestinyConnect You are indeed a true solid...true definition of a African woman

@Rau_K @DestinyConnect 🤣 NEVER!! Haven’t you noticed I always work and film even when preggies...my life / work / career never stops because of that. I soldier on. Even when they have arrived, I travel with them to work - breastfeeding 🤱 inbetween...so don’t worry! ❤️🤣
@Rau_K @DestinyConnect 🤣😜 I sure am!!! It’s a huge blessing to be. ❤️🙌🏾💃🏽

@DestinyConnect @SibaMtongana Congratulations to them. I got married in 2015&had mi 1st baby boy last year. I love my boy but the first 2 months were not so nice, crying&sleepless nites. Ke sharpo ka bana shame at least for now. I really admire her 4 kids 🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣🤣
@DestinyConnect @SibaMtongana You go girl!! "Be fruitful and increase in number" 😍
@DestinyConnect @SpitchNzawumbi @SibaMtongana Isbeleko sakhe sincasa yoh
